Hi all, the quality is too good here. 
Rose and her staff are excellent. 
Ofcourse the ambience also is superb along with receiving.
If one wants quality at reasonable price then here you are at the right place. 
One more important point is that, the after sale service which we dont find in most cases. 
In all other places they sell a product and never would respond. 
Here that is not the case, Rose maintains a healthy relationship after sale also and keeps in mind about our later reuirements too. 
This shop will bring all the fake dealers and cheaters in city, who bluff that they provide best quality. I am happy and very satisfied.
revreply:
Dear Rajanikanth. 
We are humbled and indeed honoured by your glowing comments, appreciation and review. 
It means a world to us and more importantly encourages us to keep going on to enhance end user experience. 
This has been our focus along with introducing our exclusively designed quality range of hair pieces that suit the requirements of our clients in India.
